v.
GRUBB & ELLIS COMPANY; Grubb & Ellis Realty Investors, LLC; Grubb & Ellis Securities, Inc. ; NNN Durham Office Portfolio, LLC ; and NNN Realty Advisors, Inc. No. 218P17 Supreme Court of North Carolina. September 28, 2017 Charles E. Raynal, IV, Attorney at Law, Jamie S. Schwedler, Attorney at Law, Catherine R.L. Lawson, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, for Grubb & Ellis Company, et al. John L. Sarratt, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, for Grubb & Ellis Realty Investors, LLC, et al. Thomas H. Stark, Attorney at Law, Chapel Hill, J. Anthony Penry, Attorney at Law, Seth Allen Neyhart, Attorney at Law, Chapel Hill, for NNN Durham Office Portfolio 1, LLC, et al.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the conditional petition filed by Defendants on the 17th of July 2017 in this matter for discretionary review under G.S. 7A-31 prior to a determination by the North Carolina Court of Appeals, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Dismissed as moot by order of the Court in conference, this the 28th of September 2017."
